Package wt.ixb.publicforapps

Provides APIs to develop IXB application.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ApplicationExpImportHandler
    This interface is the base class for both ApplicationExportHandler and ApplicationImportHandler.
    ApplicationExportHandler
    This is the base class for export application handlers.
    ApplicationImportHandler
    This interface represents application specific implementation of how import process gets input information.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationExportHandlerForXml
    This class provides methods for storing XML with JAXB object and content files in export jar file.
    ApplicationExportHandlerTemplate
    Class extends ApplicationExportHandler interface with trivial implementations.
    ApplicationHandlerFactory
    This factory class provides methods to create related ApplicationExportHandlerTemplate and ApplicationImportHandlerTemplate by format type.
    ApplicationImportHandlerForJar
    This class provides methods for handle XML and content files in import jar file.
    ApplicationImportHandlerForRepository
    This class provides methods for handle XML and content files in import jar file.
    ApplicationImportHandlerForXml
    This class provides methods for handle XML with JAXB object and content files in import jar file.
    ApplicationImportHandlerTemplate
    /** Class extends ApplicationImportHandler interface with trivial implementations.
    ExpImporter<T extends wt.ixb.publicforapps.contextData.ExpImpContextData>
    This abstract class represents common part of Exporter and Importer classes.
    Exporter
    Exporter is the container representing export handlers for the context of the export operation.
    Importer
    Importer is the container representing import handlers for the context of the import operation.
    IxbDocumentWrapper
    This class is only a wrapper for IxbDocument implementation and only override the getValue(String tag) method.
    IxbHelper
    This class contents several static methods that can be used in export/import application.

Package wt.ixb.publicforapps Description

Provides APIs to develop IXB application. There are two existing IXB applications in Windchill now:
  • Windchill Replication
  • Windchill Export/Import to/from jar file
To develop a new IXB application the following should be done:
  • Application Export and Import handlers should be developed, that implement interfaces ApplicationExportHandler and ApplicationImportHandler;
  • Export and Import code should be developed, that really performs Export and Import. As an example of these, code sources for Export and Import to/from jar file can be used (methods doExport and doImport from class StandardIXBService).
